Class CollisionCheck

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Collision class, checks collisions for the game

      • checkMoveCollision

        public boolean checkMoveCollision(int x,
                                  int y,
                                  int direction,
                                  int spriteSize)
        Direction checker for character movement used to check collision for that particular direction
        Parameters:
        x, - x coordinate
        y, - y coordinate
        direction, - direction of collision
        spriteSize, - size of sprite takes x and y corrdinates, the current direction and sprite size
        Returns:
        false, if not collision

      • checkWalls

        public boolean checkWalls(int x,
                          int y)
        Collision checker based on input from movement direction for all stone and brick walls
        Parameters:
        x, - x coordinate
        y, - y coordinate
        Returns:
        true if solid

      • checkPowerUpcol

        public boolean checkPowerUpcol(int x,
                               int y,
                               int spriteSize)
        checks if there is a collision with powerup object to see if collision has taken place
        Parameters:
        x, - x coordinate
        y, - y coordinate
        spriteSize, - sprite size set power up collision to true and randomise spawn timer
        Returns:
        true, if collision has taken place

        checks if there is a collision with fireball object to see if collision has taken place and collision is false
        Parameters:
        x, - x coordinate
        y, - y coordinate
        spriteSize, - sprite size set fireball collision to true remove fireball from list
        Returns:
        true, if collision has taken place
